channel.title: Blogs on SourceBans++
channel.description: Recent content in Blogs on SourceBans++

item.title: 1.6.3 Release ðŸ”–
item.description: What’s new âœ¨ Plugins +Discord: Listens for SBPP_OnBanPlayer() and the new SBPP_OnReportPlayer() natives and forwards it to the designated Discord webhook with PR #420 +Report: Uses the new SBPP_ReportPlayer() to insert reports into the submissions table, reachable via Admin Panel -> Bans -> Ban submissions with PR #408 closing #407 Main: Now whenever a banned client joins, it will mend the IP column with the corresponding value if the column is previously empty with PR #406 closing issue #187

item.title: New Site
item.description: New Site Welcome to the new SourceBans++ site, this site is meant to serve as a replacement to the old one, featuring a brand new documentation, and FAQ pages
